name: Lilith's Will
description:
Our protagonist is Lilith, Adam's first wife who left Paradise due to not following her maker's orders.

Years later, while she was in hell, Lilith found out that her dearest friend, Eve, was under the same situation she managed to escape. Enraged, she started her journey the long way up to find Eve and claim her rights.

Credits music:

Ethereal by Alexander Nakarada

Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/7978-ethereal
